title: First camera image has incorrect visuals, no shadows

content.raw:
I've been testing a [triggered camera plugin for gazebo_ros_pkgs](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/687) that only publishes images after receiving a trigger signal. I noticed that the first image looks different than subsequent images, with visuals that should only be visible to gzclient, not to camera sensors, and also without shadows.

First camera image, note the grid lines and red axis line and lack of shadow on the ground plane:

![triggered_camera_image0.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/334935287-triggered_camera_image0.png)

Second camera image, note the shadow on ground plane and lack of other lines:

![triggered_camera_image1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/446857709-triggered_camera_image1.png)

cc @iche033
